title: AutoCAD? font ID
content:
I suspect this to be some kind of CAD font. Is anyone here familiar with things like that? I found it on the inside of a new BMW front bumper. The image is of a rubbing I made so I'm sorry that it's not so clear.

Thanks for any replies!  
Best, Per
